subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki had 24 points and 14 rebounds Monday night as the Mavericks held off the Bobcats, 93-85, for their sixth consecutive victory.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki had 24 points and 14 rebounds Monday night as the Mavericks held off the Bobcats, 93-85, for their sixth consecutive victory.
